summary: After falling off her horse, a teenage girl is rescued by a manly, older fireman with whom she falls in love with tragic consequences.
cast: Camille Varenne|Gilbert Melki|Kader Mohamed|Marion Maintenay|Olivia Willaumez|Viviane Bonelli|Jean-Quentin Châtelain|Patrick Moutonnet|Edith Amsellem|Morgane Moré|Christophe Ballester|Pierre Gorris|Guillaume Barraud|Lionel Mazouillé|Mourad Boukebal|Pierre Montersino|Michel Adaoust|Amélie Giraud|Nabil Radi|Matthieu Bagnis|Audren Pellerin|Marie-Christine André|Jeanny Favier|Lydie Giraud
title: Ça brûle
